title: I was waiting for the launch of pixel 5 in India. But It's not happening.
content:
I am using pixel 2xl from 2.5 years now & using Google phones from Nexus 5 continuously.
I waited for pixel 4 to launch, then waited for pixel 5 & that is also not happening.
Google has disappointed me & now my mind is saying to buy iPhone 12, & I used to avoid apple phones all these years.

I am now confused.
